suncertify.business.network.server
Class BookingNwServer

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.business.network.server.BookingNwServer

public class BookingNwServer
extends java.lang.Object

The class is the socket server responsible for listening and connecting any client that request connection, then passing the socket on to a startService using a thread pool so it can take multiple clients.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Black

                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,

Method Detail

startServer

public void startServer()
This method is used start the server and creates a ServerSocket that listens on the stored port number. It then enters a while loop until a request comes in. When a request comes in it passes the socket to a startService in its own thread in the thread pool created by the Executor allowing the server to listen for further incoming requests.

startService

private void startService(java.net.Socket socket)
This method is used start a startService with a ServerService startService passing the Socket to it.

Parameters:
socket -

shutDownServer

public void shutDownServer()
This method shuts down the server by closing the ServerSocket.
